Module com.example.breakout_clone
Package com.example.breakout_clone.controller.game

Class PauseMenuController

java.lang.Object
com.example.breakout_clone.controller.game.PauseMenuController
public class PauseMenuController extends Object
Controller class for the PauseMenuView view. It creates the GameModel - View connection (binding) and created the controller - model connection
It is responsible for handling the user inputs when the pause menu is showing
Some method has been extracted from the old GameFrame class, to provide abstraction and adhere to single responsibility
Author:
Praket Chavan
See Also:
GameModel

    • onContinueClick

      private void onContinueClick()
      This method is call when the continue button is clicked. Hides the pause menu window and calls the GameModel.onContinueClick() method
